mapper.sql: /*[TbMetaCmpnyWrkSysM.xml][select][TANINE]*/ SELECT CMPNY_CD , SYS_CD , SYS_NM , SYS_CNTS , SYS_RMK , TPIC_EMPNO , TPIC_TELNO , TPIC_EMAIL , REGRT_EMPNO , REG_DTM , SYS_US_YN , CRT_DTM , CRT_ID , MDF_DTM , MDF_ID FROM TB_META_CMPNY_WRK_SYS_M WHERE CMPNY_CD = #{cmpny_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SYS_CD = #{sys_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
